projects.title: Preschool Registration Automation
projects.bodyText:
- The system has been developed using MS SQL, .NET Core, and MVC technologies for a desktop kindergarten registration application.
 - The database connection is established using Entity Framework, and the DB First approach has been adopted in the Data layer, with automatic entity and context classes generated through scaffolding.
 - Role-based authorization mechanisms have been implemented for admin, teacher, and student roles, ensuring clear definition of user access boundaries.

projects.title: Cryptography Algorithm
projects.bodyText:
- Encryption operations were performed using RSA, DES, and AES algorithms with cryptography libraries in C#. 
 - During this process, the encryption times and performance of each algorithm were compared in detail.
 - The analysis evaluated the algorithms in terms of processing time, security level, and efficiency, determining the most suitable encryption solution.

projects.title: Python Django
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that allows users to send texts in real time.
 - End to End encryption using **RSA** Algorithm.
 - Uses **Firebase** database to store texts.
 - Secured with **Fingerprint** lock.
